title: Resolutions Passed at AGM Held on 16 January 2024
head_office_address: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
meeting_location: The Workstation, 7, Ibiyinka Olorunbe Close, Victoria Island, Lagos
agenda_items: That the Company’s audited financial statements for the year ended 31 July 2023 together with the reports of the Directors, Auditors and Audit Committee be and are hereby received and accepted.
That the re-election of Messrs. Chuka Mordi and Chijioke Dozie as directors, retiring by rotation and having offered themselves up for re-election be and is hereby approved.
That Messrs. Olabode Akande & Co. be and are hereby appointed as the Auditor of the Company for the financial year ending 31 July 2024.
That the board of directors of the Company be and are hereby authorised to fix the remuneration of the Auditors.
The remuneration of the Managers of the Company was disclosed in line with Section 257 of the Companies & Allied Matters Act 2020.
That the following persons be and hereby nominated as the Directors to serve on the Statutory Audit Committee: Ms. Osaro Oyegun; and Ms. Nnenna Onyewuchi.

That the following persons be and are hereby elected as the shareholders’ representatives on the Statutory Audit Committee: Pastor Edokpayi Wilfred; Mr. Olugbosun Banji; and Mr. Ezechukwu Augustine Nnaemeka.

That, the Board of Directors be and is hereby authorised to raise up to the sum of ₦5,000,000,000 (five billion Naira) by way of private placement, or any other equity issuance on such terms as may be approved by the Board subject to obtaining all relevant regulatory approvals.
That all acts carried out by the Board of Directors and/or management of the Company in connection with the above be and is hereby approved and ratified.

That the Board of Directors be and is hereby authorised to perform other acts, take steps or do all such other things as may be necessary for or incidental to giving effect to the spirit and intendments of the above resolutions, as they deem appropriate.
detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document for Ellah Lakes Plc

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as the official record of the resolutions passed during the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Ellah Lakes Plc, held on January 16, 2024. It outlines the decisions made regarding the company's financial statements, director elections, auditor appointments, and other corporate governance matters.

#### Key Dates
- **AGM Date:** January 16, 2024
- **Financial Year Ended:** July 31, 2023
- **Next Financial Year Ending:** July 31, 2024

#### Company Information
- **Company Name:** Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address:** No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **RC No:** 34296
- **Website:** www.ellahlakes.com

#### Directors Present
- Olumide Akpata
- Chuka Mordi
- Shehu Abubakar
- Osaro Oyegun
- Evans Jakpa-Johns
- Maxwell Oko
- Nnenna Onyewuchi
- Enotie Ogbebor
- Chijioke Dozie
- Hauwa Nuru
- Joe Attueyi
- Charles Anajemba

#### Resolutions Passed
1. **Acceptance of Financial Statements:**
   - The audited financial statements for the year ended July 31, 2023, along with the reports from the Directors, Auditors, and Audit Committee, were received and accepted.

2. **Re-election of Directors:**
   - Messrs. Chuka Mordi and Chijioke Dozie were re-elected as directors, retiring by rotation.

3. **Appointment of Auditors:**
   - Messrs. Olabode Akande & Co. were appointed as the Auditor for the financial year ending July 31, 2024.

4. **Auditor Remuneration:**
   - The Board of Directors was authorized to fix the remuneration of the Auditors.

5. **Disclosure of Managerial Remuneration:**
   - The remuneration of the Managers of the Company was disclosed in accordance with Section 257 of the Companies & Allied Matters Act 2020.

6. **Statutory Audit Committee Nominations:**
   - The following individuals were nominated as Directors to serve on the Statutory Audit Committee:
     - Ms. Osaro Oyegun
     - Ms. Nnenna Onyewuchi

7. **Shareholders’ Representatives on Audit Committee:**
   - The following individuals were elected as shareholders’ representatives on the Statutory Audit Committee:
     - Pastor Edokpayi Wilfred
     - Mr. Olugbosun Banji
     - Mr. Ezechukwu Augustine Nnaemeka

8. **Authorization for Fundraising:**
   - The Board of Directors was authorized to raise up to ₦5,000,000,000 (five billion Naira) through private placement or other equity issuance, subject to obtaining all relevant regulatory approvals.

9. **Ratification of Board Actions:**
   - All acts carried out by the Board of Directors and/or management in connection with the above resolutions were approved and ratified.

10. **General Authorization:**
    - The Board of Directors was authorized to perform other acts and take necessary steps to give effect to the resolutions.

#### Compliance Matters
- The document references compliance with Section 257 of the Companies & Allied Matters Act 2020 regarding the disclosure of managerial remuneration.

#### Signatory
- The document is signed by OAKE Legal, serving as the Company Secretary.

This summary encapsulates all significant details from the corporate disclosure document regarding the AGM of Ellah Lakes Plc, including resolutions, appointments, and compliance matters.
